Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to a door problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
